{"id":748503276,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 5 months","timestamp":1657973451,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"42 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/748503276/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"23.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    int find(vector<vector<int>>&grid,int i,int j,int n,int m)\n    {\n        if(i<0 || j<0 || i>=n ||j>=m || !grid[i][j])\n            return 0;\n        grid[i][j]=0;\n        return 1+find(grid,i-1,j,n,m)+find(grid,i+1,j,n,m)+find(grid,i,j-1,n,m)+find(grid,i,j+1,n,m);\n    }\n    \n    int maxAreaOfIsland(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        int ans=0;\n        int n=grid.size();\n        int m=grid[0].size();\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)\n        {\n            for(int j=0;j<m;j++)\n            {\n                if(grid[i][j])\n                    ans=max(ans,find(grid,i,j,n,m));\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
